title: I'am searching the name of fronts in this CV
content:
Hello, Excuse my English, but I need help because I want to make a CV like this model with photoshop, I just want to ask you if you can help me to find the name of all the fronts in this text. Thanking you in anticipation

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cv-searching fronts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415120947/http:/typophile.com/files/cv-resume-webdesign.jpg) | 81.44 KB |
author: pilou21

comments.content:
Sorry, but I can’t resist.

Someone please cover the fronts.  
I’ll take care of the backs.

I'm pretty sure the fronts are in comic sans.

André
Bibi, please make font ID requests in the «Type ID Board» forum.

Sorry, but I can’t resist.

Jan - I do want to read your such a cheap ridicule in German! Yes, you read it right: in your mother language! I am pretty sure that you cannot use German correctly-no?
